parameters: Game Dev Quiz Starts! (This quiz directly affects gameplay LOL)
Hmm... how difficult should my game be?
Should I use text blips for dialogue?
I've already made enough progress for now.
Hmm... how difficult should my game be?
Hmm... I wonder what's in this CD.
Huh? What is this? Martian Arts lessons?!
qAudio start Training-Music bgm loop idTM
い を愛抜抜愛 類え愛 ル抜 神おを  てお 分い具神 て
て神愛抜系  逝お 売
The Blue Screen of Death... I induced it!
Learned Skill: Blue Screen of Death
I don't need this CD anymore.
Maybe I can use it in fights...
I've already made enough progress for now.
Hmm... how difficult should my game be?
Welcome to our hotel. How can I help you?
Hi. Do you have any rooms available?
Yes we do. Single or double?
Sure thing. Can I get your name?
Alright, \p[1]. Room 101. Elevator's to the right.
This one doesn't seem to be working.
I wonder what Amy's up to. Let's see.
I-I'm sorry. I got a bit curious.
It looked like you were having a lot of fun.
I was... until someone interrupted me.
It's... well, I haven't decided yet.
You don't know what the game you're making is about?
I'm a pantser, not a plotter--goddammit!
Should I break the fourth wall?
Oh, I don't know, is it that kind of a game?
You seem kind of on edge today.
Oh, it's not a big deal. I'll get back to my desk.
You can tell me if it's not too personal.
Wow, you really made the whole website.
It's pretty bare bones. But it works. Just have to publish it now.
But before that -- you don't have a vCard, right?
A virtual contact card. We should have one on the website.
Oh and we should design a logo. That'll look professional.
Yeah. I'll whip up a logo too. Wait.
Say it. It's trash, isn't it?
Well, I would use a less harsh word.
Let's just go with my earlier, simpler version.
Yay! I can't believe we finally have a website.
I can't believe you didn't have one already.
Thanks, Max. I owe you one.
Here's our Arcade card. Take it. I've loaded it with some credits.
Oh, yes! It's been my favorite place in the hotel for, like, forever.
I have to check it out then.
It's at the end of the hallway. Have fun!
Just checking how our website is doing.
So... are we getting any visitors?
Well, I guess it'll take some time to get noticed.
Yeah... wait. We got a 5-star review!

Uh... it says: "I checked their website. No photos! What kind of morons run this hotel?? I'm not booking a hotel room without having a look first. What if it's got some stupid vaporwave aesthetic or something."
Oh shit. We forgot the photos.
Alright. Just get me a camera and I'll take some.
Save the compliments for later. I have a feeling I'll be helping you a lot in the near future.
Why would you think I have one?
Well, unless we can get our hands on a camera, this won't work.
Hey, Amy. Guess what? I got the camera.
Are you serious? How did you get it?
Well, I guess we should have pictures of the lobby, elevator and a room. Oh, and the arcade, obviously!
Hey, are you done with the photos?
Hope you're enjoying your stay here.
Yeah, just tired. What do you need?
Mind if I use a computer for work?
Sure. the one on the left isn't working though.
Yeah... and that's why I offered to work as a Receptionist here.
Can't complain. And besides. I'm helping my family business stay alive.
This doesn't sound sustainable, you know?
I know. I'm trying my best to pitch in before I go to Uni this fall.
I see. So you just need more guests right?
Well. I can have a look at your marketing strategy. I know a thing or two about it.
Okay. What do you wanna know?
Let me look at the hotel website.
Hey, I got almost all the pictures.
The old man refused to move. I couldn't get a good picture of the Arcade.
Oh. That's alright. He is a... difficult guest.
Anyway, I'll upload these immediately. Thank you so much. I owe you one for this.
The pictures really made the website beautiful. I can't thank you enough.
We have terrible reviews online. Last time I checked we only had a couple of those, but now there are a lot.
Oh. What are they saying? Reviews are feedback. Improve the things they are complaining about.
Improve how? We have no money to hire more people. If we don't get new guests, how are we gonna hire people?
Still, there must be something you could improve without spending much?
You just have to convince our guests to post a good review.
Please help me this last time. I'm sure our business will boom once we get some good reviews online.
Looks like I have no choice.
You get to choose which guest to approach first!
Time To Channel My Inner Beggar
Have you been able to convince the guests?
<laughs> \p[1]... you're so funny. You remind me of my little brother.
\p[1]! The good reviews are working! I already got some new reservations.
Can’t believe how much you helped. It's all because of you.
Give those puppy-dog eyes some credit too. How could I refuse them?
I don't know what you're talking about.
I'm still surprised. We just put the website up in the morning. How did the word get out so fast?
Hmm... well, those who asked for reservations said something strange.
They said they're fans of Lucifer and are coming here to meet him.
I'd like to check out, please.
Sleep well, King of the Busts.
I have no business in there.
